author: Patrick O
title: An ageing first class hotel in the middle of town with easy access to almost everything
text:
Very good service in the restaurants and check in. Rooms are getting tired despite recent renovations. Great choice of TV channels and a good gym. Location right in the centre of town means government offices, CBD and shopping is within walking distance.
Room Tip: Great views from all rooms but choose north facing rooms to avoid music at weekends. See more room tips
